testcase.system-out: When Browser should be open and url should be navigated.....................passed And user should be hover on location and click on BangloreLink..............passed And user should be able to mouse hover on the Buy Link......................passed And The Ready to Move link should be displayed..............................passed And user should be click on Flat in Banglore and navigated to the FlatInBanglorePage.passed And user should be click on MenuBarIcon.....................................passed And user should be able to click on help link...............................passed And user should be clicks on the Help Center link and navigates to the Help Center page.passed And user should be clicks on the Explore More link..........................passed And user should be clicks on the Manage CallsandAlerts link.................passed Then user should be able to click on the first question.....................passed

testcase.name: Validate that the user is able to add flat to the shortList
testcase.system-out: Given Browser should be open and url should be navigated....................passed When user should be able to hover on login link.............................passed And user should be able to click on login button and navigate to the login page.passed And user should be able to enter valid credentails and click on next button.passed And user should be able to click on continue................................passed Then user should be logged in...............................................passed When Browser should be open and url should be navigated.....................passed And user should be hover on location and click on BangloreLink..............passed And user should be able to mouse hover on the Buy Link......................passed And user should be able to click on BudgetHomes and navigated to the BudgetHomesPage.passed And user should be able to click on the like button.........................passed And user should be able to mouse hover on Shortlist button and click on View your Shortlisted Properties link.passed Then user should be able see the property in Shortlist page.................passed
